items.title: Applying conditionally
items.description: Tailwind를 사용하면 변형 수정자를 사용하여 다양한 상태에서 유틸리티 클래스를 조건부로 적용할 수 있습니다. 예를 들어 hover:leading-loose를 사용하면 호버 시 Lead-Loose 유틸리티만 적용할 수 있습니다.
items.code: So I started to walk into the water. I won't lie to you boys, I was terrified. But I pressed on, and as I made my way past the breakers a strange calm came over me. I don't know if it was divine intervention or the kinship of all living things but I tell you Jerry at that moment, I was a marine biologist.
